todos.title: [SEAN] Basis Partnership Proposal
todos.description:
Tell Sean: I'll give you requirements, deliver code, and you get 10-15% margin. Just send clients a link to a webpage that reads 'upload your Google Doc here'.

VALUE PROP: Basis gets 15% profit margin PLUS all of Sean's hours back (~80 hrs/month). This backlog output is from ONE Google Doc â€” with JIRA detail, you'd get much more.

todos.title: [CHARLIE] First Mover Partnership Strategy
todos.description:
Talk to Charlie about partnership strategy:

1. VALUE PROP: It's only a matter of time until others figure this out. Let's gain first mover advantage.

2. APPROACH: Move forward faster by leveraging each other's progress. Goal: capture market share and solidify first mover advantage as a brand.

3. BRAND VISION: A brand that quickly produces working software from obscure requirements. Also product verticals for executive coaching, biohacking, fitness, dating, etc.

4. KENDO STRATEGY: They have delivery problems â€” we become their outsource solution for delivery. Don't introduce new workflow (causes resistance). Just deliver results.

KEY INSIGHT: AI sells fastest when it doesn't require humans to change. Ron and Kendo will not change.

todos.title: Gartner Research Papers Workflow
todos.description: Work session with Greg: how to download Gartner research papers and have Greg read through them. Just download and put on Google Drive somewhere?

todos.title: Tony Wong Case Studies & History
todos.description: Create case study links for Greg to build Tony Wong history of experience, skills, achievements: enterprise software development, executive coaching, zen, biohacking, podcasting. Feeds marketing and social media.

todos.title: Akira PMO Access for Greg
todos.description:
Best way to get Greg access to Akira AI PMO agents Joana developed in Lovable and Vercel? Use her login or export code to GitHub for Greg to access? Goal: see if Greg can replicate her AI PMO agent results inside OpenClaw.

Email sent to Joana - waiting for response.

todos.title: Vercel Hosting Cost Analysis
todos.description: As dashboards increase, Vercel costs go up. Consider alternate hosting options.

todos.title: Connect Greg to Kendo Slack
todos.description:
Connect Greg to Kendo Slack so he can read it for me. Much of data from Kendo Slack becomes my news dashboard.

For replies: Greg tells me what to reply and I post from my account (or Greg replies directly - TBD).

todos.title: Export Multicity Living Chat from Grok
todos.description:
Download Multicity Living chat from grok.ai for Greg to prototype the Exec.AI Discussion Tracker dashboard.

âœ… COMPLETED: Chat exported and saved to /grok-data/multi-city-living.md
Dashboard built: https://greg-dashboard.vercel.app/multi-city-living.html

todos.title: Set Up Greg-Context Folder in Google Drive
todos.description:
Drop share links of documents in Chrome tabs into a Google Drive folder for Greg.

Recommendation: Create a 'Greg-Context' folder in Drive for docs you want Greg to reference. Greg can then search/read via the gog skill.

todos.title: Explain Profiler & Multi-Agent Distribution Product Customizer
todos.description:
Need to explain the profiler and multi-agent distribution product customizer to Greg, so we can set that up to distribute and market our products.

Tony needs to walk Greg through this concept.

ðŸ”— Related: This is the MISSING PIECE for value prioritization (Pareto Engine). See VALUE-PRIORITIZATION.md

todos.title: Learn Local Unconstrained Models on Mac Studio
todos.description:
Have Greg teach me how to use unconstrained models locally on my 512GB Mac Studio.

Greg can walk through: Ollama setup, recommended models (Llama, Mistral, etc.), and how to run them without API limits.
